metadata.name: The Wine and Blood
metadata.description:
Sometimes there is some thoughts that they telling us: We are all in the big war in this planet earth, The Holy endless war between the good and evil, The Yin yang. 
With all these words This is our choice to be the cruel  and cold blood warrior that only care about himself with a bloody hands and darkest soul or we can be a happy and smiling warrior trying to bring world peace with a cup of wine in his hand. The wine will help him to forget all the pains around this world. Thatâ€™s a story of Wine and Blood.
